## auth.AuthProviderConfig.providerId property

The provider ID defined by the developer. For a SAML provider, this is always prefixed by `saml.`<!-- -->. For an OIDC provider, this is always prefixed by `oidc.`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
providerId: string;
```
